rules_text:
Foreshadow 2–{2}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with two time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
You may cast Bestial Tarrasque from your graveyard using its foreshadow ability.
